name: Ride n' Chill
description:
Ride n' Chill is a relaxing low poly car driving game with a chill radio. 

Features :

  • Radio with 3 channels and 27 tracks 📻 🎶
  • An island to explore  🌴
  • A toy like town 🏠
  • Get lost in a  mountain maze ⛰  
  • Transport passengers to their destination 🚕
  • Navigate around with a compass  🧭
  • 3 upgrades to unlock 🔧
  • Fuel management  ⛽
  • Get destroyed 💥

Controls :

  • WASD or Arrow keys to move 
  • SPACE to brake 
  • E to interact
  • R to change radio channel
  • ESC to quit game
  • F to show/hide frame rate

System Requirements :

  • i3 7100 or Ryzen 3 1200
  • GTX 1050 or RX 560
  • 4 GB ram (8 GB recommended)
